org.hibernate.ogm

Interface OgmSessionFactory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Mapping, Referenceable, Serializable, SessionFactory, SessionFactoryImplementor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OgmSessionFactoryImpl

    public interface OgmSessionFactory
extends SessionFactoryImplementor
    Provides OGM-specific functionality on the session factory level.
    Author:
    Gunnar Morling
